comments.en:
Portable dye-sublimation photo printer in 4x6inch/10x15cm/A6 photo size. 300 dpi, full 24-bit color depth (256 levels per CMY color component), full-bleed (border-less). Produces laboratory-like photos. Does not print on normal paper. Parallel port connection

A driver for this printer is under developemnt by the Gimp-Print project. The printer should work with the version 4.3.16 or newer of the development line.

Consumables/Refills: Packs with special paper and three-color ribbon
